remarks: Membership in a dilated interval.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
statement:
iccdili.1 $e |- A e. RR $.
iccdili.2 $e |- B e. RR $.
iccdili.3 $e |- R e. RR+ $.
iccdili.4 $e |- ( A x. R ) = C $.
iccdili.5 $e |- ( B x. R ) = D $.
iccdili $p |- ( X e. ( A [,] B ) -> ( X x. R ) e. ( C [,] D ) ) $.
